title: 21st October 1966: 144 people killed in the Aberfan disaster after a colliery spoil tip collapses
itunes:summary: At 9.15am on the 21st October 1966, 116 children and 28 adults were killed when a colliery spoil tip above the Welsh village of Aberfan ...
